name: jsonview
title: JSONView
description: View JSON documents in the browser.
author: Benjamin Hollis

preferences.name: jsonHttpAccept
preferences.title: Include "application/json" in the HTTP Accept header for requests
preferences.description: Only enable this if you need it - this can cause problems with some websites.

preferences.name: alternateContentTypes
preferences.title: Alternate JSON content types
preferences.description: Other content types that should be treated as JSON, separated by commas.

preferences.name: useNativeJsonView
preferences.title: Use built-in Firefox JSON viewer
preferences.description: Firefox now includes a built-in JSON viewer you can use instead of JSONView.

ca-AD.description: Visualitza els documents JSON al navegador.

en.description: View JSON documents in the browser.

es-ES.description: Permite abrir documentos JSON en el navegador.

fr.description: Afficher les documents JSON dans le navigateur.

hi-IN.description: Json डॉक्यूमेंट को ब्राउज़र में देखे.

it.description: Permette di visualizzare i file JSON nel browser.

ja.description: JSON ドキュメントをブラウザー内で表示します。

ru-RU.description: Просмотр документов в формате JSON прямо в браузере.

zh-CN.description: 在浏览器中查看JSON 文件.
